articles.author: Craig Hope
articles.title: Eddie Howe accuses Premier League rivals of inflating transfer fees in bid to deny Newcastle success - Daily Mail
articles.description: Eddie Howe insisted that 'everyone is against us' after Newcastle failed to bring in a number of players during the summer transfer window - accusing rivals of inflating transfer fees.
